summary:
Skyrim Facelifts: Followers ILLIA Edition
A facelift for follower Illia, with two version available.
descriptionHtml:
I picked up Illia not long ago as a follower after doing the Repentance quest in Darklight Tower. However, I didn't much like her vanilla look, and, after being unable to find one on the Nexus, I decided to put together one myself. I then decided later to upload it here to Nexus for those who want a new face for her as well, but didn't like was available before.
Originally, I had just edited her as the Imperial she is originally, but after seeing [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19344] [Beans redo of her] [/url] I decided to create a Breton/Forsworn version of her as well.

[b][size=3]REQUIREMENTS:[/size][/b]
[list]
[*]Version 1 and Version 2 require [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25395] Mackoms Lore Style Hair set [/url]
[*]However, there are two sets, V1.5 & V2.5 come with vanilla hairstyles. There are also extra sets for Version 1 that don't have the warpaint. Sets for version 2 may come in the future.
[/list]
[b][size=3]MODS USED:[/size][/b]
If you want her to look like she does in the pictures, try installing these.
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5865]83Willows REAL DREADLOCKS female Forsworn Headdress Retexture [/url] (highly recommended for Version 2)
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869]Covereyes [/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28645]Nuska Real Skin for Women [/url](Mod not available)
[/list]
[b][size=3]INSTALL:[/size][/b]
[list]
[*]Install : Use NMM or extract the files into the skyrim root folder manually. Make sure that the .esp is below mods that affect followers such as UFO
[*]Uninstall : Use NMM or delete all of the files manually.
[/list]
[b][size=3]COMPATIBILITY:[/size][/b]
My facelifts should be compatible with all mods, including follower overhauls, face/skin textures, etc, etc. Just be sure to place the .esp at the end of the load order after all other companion mods.
author: RavenSylphe
